# Carte interactive prototype (Plotly)

```{python}
import plotly.express as px

# Exemple de données capitales
data = [
    {"country": "France", "capital": "Paris", "lat": 48.8566, "lon": 2.3522},
    {"country": "USA", "capital": "Washington DC", "lat": 38.9072, "lon": -77.0369},
    {"country": "Japan", "capital": "Tokyo", "lat": 35.6895, "lon": 139.6917},
    {"country": "Benin", "capital": "Cotonou", "lat": 6.3703, "lon": 2.3912}
]

import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

fig = px.scatter_geo(df, lat="lat", lon="lon", text="capital",
                     hover_name="country", projection="natural earth")
fig.show()
